H1.text: who won the mvp for the national league. Nolan Arenado

H2.text: who won the mvp for the national league. Joey Votto

H3.text: who won the mvp for the national league. Giancarlo Stanton

A4.text: He clinched fourth place in the NL MVP voting—the highest ranking of his career—behind Stanton, Votto and Goldschmidt, and ahead of fifth-place Blackmon.

A5.text: He received official consideration for the NL MVP Award for the first time, ranking eighth in voting behind Harper, Paul Goldschmidt, Joey Votto, Anthony Rizzo, Andrew McCutchen, Jake Arrieta, and Zack Greinke.
